questions.question: How accurate is the transcription?
questions.answer: MeetingMind uses advanced speech recognition with 95%+ accuracy for clear audio. It supports multiple languages and accents, and you can always edit transcripts manually if needed.

questions.question: Is my meeting data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, all recordings and transcripts are encrypted end-to-end. We comply with GDPR and SOC 2 standards, and you have full control over who can access your meeting data.

questions.question: Can I share summaries with my team?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can share summaries via email, export to your project management tools, or create a searchable knowledge base of all past meetings.
